javadoc: Command for adding uninitialized memory blocks

methods.name: <init>

params.name: name
params.comment: the name for the new memory block.

params.name: source
params.comment: indicates what is creating the block

params.name: start
params.comment: the start address for the the block

params.name: length
params.comment: the length of the new block

params.name: read
params.comment: sets the block's read permission flag

params.name: write
params.comment: sets the block's write permission flag

params.name: execute
params.comment: sets the block's execute permission flag

params.name: isOverlay
params.comment: if true, the block will be created in a new overlay address space.

name: AddUninitializedMemoryBlockCmd
comment: Command for adding uninitialized memory blocks
